caption.title: Major goals and targets for HIV/AIDS.
caption.p: ART, antiretroviral therapy; GFATM, Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria; LMIC, low- or middle-income country; MDG, Millennium Development Goal; PEPFAR, US Presidentâ€™s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief; UNAIDS, Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS.
